name: AlphaBlock
description:
Welcome to the Block-Corp Test Range, unit E-60. A new range has been prepared, all for you. It will test your abilities and gather valuable data for future research.

You will be rewarded with an Official Block-Corp Workplace Coffee Break if you conclude this test range successfully. Provided that you are very careful.

Best of luck,

Complex, Friend-Computer.

=====================

AlphaBlock is a quick classic point-and-click puzzle adventure game. Use your wits and your inventory to solve different puzzles and advance to new tests, all while avoiding electrical traps.

---------------------------------

Controls:

You point and click with the Left mouse button to take an action, and you can cycle between actions with your Right mouse button or with your scroll wheel.

You can move your character with the arrowkeys on your keyboard.

You can quick-select verbs from the keyboard: O for Observe, H for Handle, G for Go To and T for Talk.

The tab key will open up your inventory window.

---------------------------------

Content Advisory:

Mild Swearing and Mild Violence.

---------------------------------

Platform:
Windows.

An Untested version for Linux is also available for download.

---------------------------------

Languages Available:

English, Swedish.

---------------------------------
Download Files:

Contains the game executable file, a setup file for changing display settings and language, and game documentation.

---------------------------------

Installation:

Download the provided files. Either run the AlphaBlock executable file, or run the Setup program to change your settings and language.

---------------------------------
